song.englishname: O, For a Thousand Tongues to Sing

english.segment1: O, for a thousand tongues to sing. My great Redeemers praise. The glories of my God and King. The triumphs of His grace
english.segment2: My gracious Master and my God. Assist me to proclaim. To spread through all the earth abroad. The honors of Thy name
english.segment3: So come on and sing out. Let our anthem grow loud. There is one great love Jesus
english.segment4: Jesus, the name that charms our fears. That bids our sorrows cease. Tis music in the sinners ears. Tis life and health and peace
english.segment5: He breaks the power of cancelled sin. He sets the prisoners free. His blood can make the foulest clean. His blood availed for me
english.segment6: He speaks and listening to His voice. New life the dead receive. The mournful broken hearts rejoice. The humble poor believe
english.segment7: Glory to God and praise and love. Be ever, ever givn. By saints below and saints above. The church in earth and Heavn
english.segment8: There are so few words. That never grow old. There are so few words. That never grow old. Jesus
